thread.title: GAMING: Can Di Maria do it again?
thread.title_full: GAMING: Can Di Maria do it again?

title: GAMING: Can Di Maria do it again?
text:
0 18-Feb-2017 01:00:00 You could win £250 this week if you can pick 7 anytime goal scorers from our list of Goal Star Strikers. Play the Goal Star Strikers game and you can win £250 of Amazon vouchers to spend on the latest football kits and boots! PLAY FOR FREE 
We’ve got another exciting round of our goal scorer prediction game: Goal Star Strikers. Featuring players in action in the FA Cup and in Europe’s top leagues. 
You can win £250 in Amazon Vouchers by being the first to pick 7 goal scorers from the list of Star Strikers. It’s free to enter: you just have to select 7 players you think will score in the next round of games to be in with a chance of winning the prize. 
Make your picks on the Goal Star Strikers site here and choose the players you think will score. Don’t forget to confirm your entry by registering for Goal, you have to register to enter the competition and qualify for the prize. 
Ahead of the action our Fantasy Football scout share his tips for the next round of games based on the players current form, shooting accuracy and goal scoring record. These are the strikers on this week’s shortlist: Angel Di Maria 
The winger starred against Barcelona in the Champions League. Di Maria had some early struggles at PSG but is now finding his form with the French Champions. PSG are currently second in Ligue 1 behind Monaco and they host 9th placed Toulouse at the weekend. Di Maria scored at home against Toulouse in the League Cup. Di Maria has a shooting accuracy of 59% and has odds of 5/4 to score with bookmakers. Anthony Martial 
United travel to Blackburn in the FA Cup on Sunday looking to progress in the competition they won last season. United have won both their previous cup-ties 4-0 this season. Martial looks rejuvenated and scored in his last game against Watford. Martial has a shooting accuracy of 60% in the cup and is 6/4 to score. Antoine Griezmann 
Atletico Madrid visit Sporting Gijon on Saturday looking for their first away win 5 games. Atletico scored 5 in the reverse fixture earlier in the season. Griezmann scored twice in that game and he scored the winner against Celta Vigo in their last league game. Griezmann has scored 9 goals in 21 league appearances and has a shooting accuracy of 59%. Cristiano Ronaldo 
Real Madrid have scored 8 goals in their last 3 league games and they host an Espanyol team who they have beaten in their last 6 meetings. CR7 has scored 14 times in 16 league appearances this season. He is 2/7 to score in this game and he currently has a shooting accuracy of 51%. Luis Suarez 
Barcelona face Leganes at home on Sunday night, a team they beat 5-1 in the reverse fixture. Suarez scored the second goal in that game and now has 18 goals from 20 league appearances, recording a shooting accuracy of 55%. There are odds of 4/11 on Suarez to score. Henrikh Mkhitaryan 
United have scored 8 goals in the FA Cup this season so expect Mkhitaryan to join Martial in finding the net in this Lancashire derby. He scored in the last round and is 6/4 to score this weekend. Edin Dzeko 
The Bosnian striker has an impressive 18 goals from 24 league appearances this season. Dzeko has scored in his last 5 games in all competitions and has a shooting accuracy of 54%. Dzeko is 4/6 to score with bookmakers. 
There are odds of over 150/1 for all 7 selections to score this week. Do you agree with these selections? Who will you pick? Select your Star Strikers HERE Related
